segments.text: Hello , I set up my laundry yesterday , are they being ready ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They will be ready this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no . I ’ m leaving for Japan at eleven this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that right ? We are very sorry
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought it the same day service . Anyway , please do a hurry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m afraid ... be can returned by eleven o ’ clock .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , then . Would you send to Japan , please ?
segments.speaker: S1
